definition: phonetic bo/used in onomatopoeia/see 呼呼哱[hu1 hu1 bo1], hoopoe bird
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
colloquial word for hoopoe bird (Upupa epops)

sentences.english: He has very limited knowledge. He can't understand what hoopoo means.
sentences.chinese: 浅薄，不能理解呼呼哱是什么意思。

definition: prisoner of war/to capture/to take prisoner/(old) northern barbarian/slave
Bayan (name)/Bayan of the Baarin (1236-1295), Mongol Yuan general under Khubilai Khan, victorious over the Southern Song 1235-1239/Bayan of the Merkid (-1340), Yuan dynasty general and politician
Wu Sangui (1612-1678), Chinese general who let the Manchus into China and helped them establish the Qing Dynasty, later leading a revolt against Qing in an effort to start his own dynasty
Tangut branch of the Qiang 羌 ethnic group/ancient ethnic group who made up the Xixia dynasty 西夏 1038-1227
Tartar (various northern tribes in ancient China)/Tatar (Turkic ethnic group in central Asia)
Muqali or Mukhali (1170-1223), military commander under Genghis Khan 成吉思汗[Cheng2 ji2 si1 han2]
